content:
I would appreciate a review of this, it will greatly simplify some constructions of limits in LightProfinite. This PR is purely topological, and does the following two things:

  • Pulls out one direction of isCompact_open_iff_eq_finite_iUnion_of_isTopologicalBasis as a separate lemma with fewer assumptions,
  • Uses this new lemma to prove TopologicalSpace.Clopens.countable_iff_second_countable that a totally disconnected compact Hausdorff space has countably many clopens iff it is second countable.
